attributes.action: Demand MP's named for submitting false exspense claims are charged with fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mp's to be charged with fraud for stealing public money.if any member of the public had made fraudulent claims like mp's have we would be questioned and charged.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
